text: Futhi ngempela sathumela kuzona zonke izizwe isithunywa ukuze (abantu) bakhonze uMvelinqangi baqhelelane nabonkulunkulu bamanga (izithixo) ngakho-ke phakathi kwabo kunalabo abaholwa nguMvelinqangi futhi phakathi kwabo kunalabo okugxilisiwe kubona ukuduka ngakho-ke hambani emhlabeni bese niyabona ukuthi sasinjani isiphetho sababephika
